title: Cinematic Action Drums Vol.1
description: Cinematic Action Drums Vol.1 is a collection of powerful, dynamic drum loops, perfect for creating epic, energetic and dynamic soundtracks for action scenes, video games and cinematic projects.
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO

With these loops, you can highlight your project by adding powerful and aggressive drum beats to it, which will add drama and tension to key moments of your work.


This sound pack contains loops in the following BPMs:

100, 105, 110, 115, 120, 125, 130, 135, 140.

Total - 720 Loops (432 Straight and 288 Triplet loops).

Bonus - 20 one-shot sounds (for Ends).

Cinematic Action Drums Vol.1 includes 10 loop kit versions for each tempo, helping you quickly and efficiently create a basic rhythm for your action movie soundtracks, trailers and music tracks.


There are separate layers, such as STEM, which make up the main (Full) loops - Low Drums, Med Drums, Hi Drums,there are versions with and without Taiko Rolls:


  • Full (90 loops)
  • Hi_Perc (90 loops)
  • Low_Perc (90 loops)
  • Mid_Perc (90 loops)
  • Taiko_Roll_Full (90 loops)
  • Taiko_Roll_Hi_Perc (90 loops)
  • Taiko_Roll_Low_Perc (90 loops)
  • Taiko_Roll_Mid_Perc (90 loops)


All loops are intuitively sorted into separate folders.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 740

Number of Audio Cues: 740

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
